```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
text <- readLines("goodreads_reading_challenge.html", encoding = "UTF-8")
text <- text[grep("<img.*class=\"bookCover\"", text)]
book <- data.frame(bid=rep(0, 14))
```
